newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - SALOMON UPS APPLIED.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - SALOMON UPS APPLIED.

text.p: Salomon Brothers said it upgraded Applied Materials Inc to strong buy from hold.
-- After the market closed Tuesday, Applied's third-quarter earnings beat Wall Street expectations.
-- Salomon said orders have soared over 20 percent sequentially.
-- Said book-to-bill ratio reached 1.17 in the quarter.
-- Said Applied is gaining market share from Lam Research Corp and Novellus Systems Inc.
-- Said new products are receiving excellent acceptance.
-- Said "we believe the gross margin will rebound to over 50 percent from 47.2 percent in the most recent quarter."
-- Said raised the 1997 estimate to $299 a share from $2.50 a share, increased the 1998 estimate to $5.00 a share from $3.90 a share and set a 1999 estimate of $6.75 a sahre.
-- Said price target is $125 a share. The time frame for the target was not immediately available.
-- Believes Applied's financial growth will outpace that of its competitors and "should afford the company a superior valuation."
